Crystallized flame

Crystallized flame
Type: Material
Value: 5
Fine Value: 30
Keyword: Ingredient
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

A large chunk of crystal with what appears to contain the essence of fire itself. You can see flames dancing across its surface and it feels burning hot without actually being on fire.

The Crystallized flame item is a material.

Uses

Recipe Ingredient

Crystallized flame is an ingredient in the following recipe:

Item Name Service
Requirement 		Skills Materials
Used 		Recipe
Outputs
Fireball wine Needs Advanced Kitchen service or better. Cooking lvl. 63 10x Fortified wine
5x Crystallized flame		 5x Fireball wine

Sources

Activity Drops

Activity Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Mine crystal coal Mining lvl. 60 1 2.439% ~1 in 41 5,207 steps 2,296 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
